Calculates Distance between 2 points

distVincenty

public static double distVincenty(double lat1,
                                  double lon1,
                                  double lat2,
                                  double lon2)
Vincenty Inverse Solution of Geodesics on the Ellipsoid (c) Chris Veness 2002-2010 from: Vincenty inverse formula - T Vincenty, "Direct and Inverse Solutions of Geodesics on the Ellipsoid with application of nested equations", Survey Review, vol XXII no 176, 1975 http://www.ngs.noaa.gov/PUBS_LIB/inverse.pdf Calculates geodetic distance between two points specified by latitude/longitude using Vincenty inverse formula for ellipsoids http://www.movable-type.co.uk/scripts/latlong-vincenty.html

Parameters:
(Number) - lat1, lon1: first point in decimal degrees
(Number) - lat2, lon2: second point in decimal degrees
Returns:
(Number) distance in metres between points
